title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 34.1 - Form of statement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 34.1 - Form of statement

State Regulations

The debt statement form to be used in connection with
public sales of bonds by school districts coterminous with or partly within or
wholly within, cities having less than 125,000 inhabitants according to the
latest Federal census, under the provisions of section 109.00 and title 10 of
article 2 of the Local Finance Law, shall be in the form shown at Exhibit A
attached hereto [FN*] and hereby made a part hereof as fully as if herein set
forth. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
34.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
